posts.author: Valkos
posts.content:
When you have access to these, what spells do you normally put in them?

First two I think of is Shadow Shield and Premonition.

After a few looks at the spell list; Greater Spell Mantle, protection from spells, mind blank, energy buffer.

Anything else you guys just cannot run without?

posts.author: Mick Dagger
posts.content:
Sometimes the sequencer can be useful also with low level spells:
With my Bard 5/Assassin 26/AA 9 build I put the only level 2 bard spells I had; Cat's, Bull's and Fox's in a 3 spells sequencer. The character gets high enough dex to use robes, so I picked a sequencer robe once I could find a decent one.
The level 5 bard only has 3 known lvl 2 spells, and can only cast one per day. The sequencer let me store all 3 spells, one at a time, so I could cast them all every day, and at a much higher caster level than the puny 5 bard levels.

posts.author: darktooth
posts.content: When casting spells from a sequencer, is there a chance of arcane spell failure, or is it interruptible? What if I’m casting a combination of arcane and divine spells?

posts.author: webshaman1
posts.content:
TT (Tensor's Transformation - PnP version only).  Aura of Vitality.

Sequencers cannot be interrupted nor is there a chance of spell failure.

posts.author: darktooth
posts.content: Bull's Strength, Bless, Aid, Improved Invisibility, Prayer, Divine Power, Battletide

posts.author: Aquarius 233
posts.content: Protection from spells + mind blank is a nice combo. I use it a lot especially with meelers.

posts.author: Orion
posts.content:
Depends on consumables (wands, scrolls, potions) and items (ie. belt of guiding light - death immunity) available
Certain spells are commonly found on potions (ie Bless/Aid, Bulls/Cats/Endurance, Barkskin tend to be pretty frequent)

My top 3:
- improved invisibility, premonition, mind blank

Improved invisibility plus premonition grants enormous physical defensive capabilities especially for a two handed build

Mind blank is nice because the Spell level 8 CL 15 is the most dispel resistant of the mind immunity buffs. 
- lesser mind blank spell level 5 CL 9, clarity spell level 2 CL 3, magic circle v alignment spell level 3 CL 5 or prot v alignment spell level 1 CL 5

Others
- shadow shield/death ward (for death immunity, only if no death immunity item is equipped), flame weapon, keen edge (dev crit builds particularly), freedom (ideal from items but if no freedom items available)
